nodes.text: Kantam's lightsaber was a green-bladed lightsaber owned by Jedi Master Kantam Sy during the High Republic Era. Sy wielded the lightsaber during a battle against the Nihil on the moon Quantxi.
Kantam's lightsaber first appeared in the Galactic Data File page of the comic book The High Republic Adventures 4, published by IDW on May 5, 2021.
